Key Match Events: Nitish Kumar Reddy scored 74 runs in his second T20I match
India scored 221/9, their highest T20I total against Bangladesh
Post-Match Reflections: India secured a series win against Bangladesh
India's spinners had a strong performance with miserly and incisive spells
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a Delhi surface that started off as tacky but improved for batting as the night progressed
Bangladesh struggled to score their highest T20I total to stay alive in the series
Others: Bangladesh's spinners suffered on both comparisons with their fast bowlers bowling 12 overs for 102 runs, but the spinners conceded 116 in their eight
India lost wickets looking for quick runs towards the end of their innings
